mapper.select:
select YEAR,MONTH, sum(ZG_LJ_FSZFY) as zgLjFszfy,sum(ZG_LJ_TCJJFSJE) as zgLjTcjjfsje, sum(ZG_LJ_DBJJFSJE) as zgLjDbjjfsje, sum(ZG_LJ_GWYJJFSJE) as zgLjGwyjjfsje, sum(ZG_LJ_JZJJFSJE) as zgLjJzjjfsje, sum(ZG_LJ_SCJJFSJE) as zgLjScjjfsje, sum(ZG_LJ_GZJJFSJE) as zgLjGzjjfsje, sum(ZG_LJ_XJ) as zgLjXj, sum(ZG_LJ_JSXJ) as zgLjJsxj, sum(ZG_LJ_TCJJJSJE) as zgLjTcjjjsje, sum(ZG_LJ_DBJJJSJE) as zgLjDbjjjsje, sum(ZG_LJ_GWYJJJSJE) as zgLjGwyjjjsje, sum(ZG_LJ_JZJJJSJE) as zgLjJzjjjsje, sum(ZG_LJ_SCJJJSJE) as zgLjScjjjsje, sum(ZG_LJ_GZJJJSJE) as zgLjGzjjjsje, sum(ZG_LJ_JJBFXJ) as zgLjJjbfxj, sum(ZG_LJ_JJBFJE) as zgLjJjbfje, sum(ZG_LJ_KHBZJ) as zgLjKhbzj, sum(ZG_LJ_KK) as zgLjKk, sum(ZG_DY_FSZFY) as zgDyFszfy, sum(ZG_DY_TCJJFSJE) as zgDyTcjjfsje, sum(ZG_DY_DBJJFSJE) as zgDyDbjjfsje, sum(ZG_DY_GWYJJFSJE) as zgDyGwyjjfsje, sum(ZG_DY_JZJJFSJE) as zgDyJzjjfsje, sum(ZG_DY_SCJJFSJE) as zgDyScjjfsje, sum(ZG_DY_GZJJFSJE) as zgDyGzjjfsje, sum(ZG_DY_XJ) as zgDyXj, sum(ZG_DY_JSXJ) as zgDyJsxj, sum(ZG_DY_TCJJJSJE) as zgDyTcjjjsje, sum(ZG_DY_DBJJJSJE) as zgDyDbjjjsje, sum(ZG_DY_GWYJJJSJE) as zgDyGwyjjjsje, sum(ZG_DY_JZJJJSJE) as zgDyJzjjjsje, sum(ZG_DY_SCJJJSJE) as zgDyScjjjsje, sum(ZG_DY_GZJJJSJE) as zgDyGzjjjsje, sum(ZG_DY_JJBFXJ) as zgDyJjbfxj, sum(ZG_DY_JJBFJE) as zgDyJjbfje, sum(ZG_DY_KHBZJ) as zgDyKhbzj, sum(ZG_DY_KK) as zgDyKk,
sum(JM_LJ_FSZFY) as jmLjFszfy, sum(JM_LJ_TCJJFSJE) as jmLjTcjjfsje, sum(JM_LJ_DBJJFSJE) as jmLjDbjjfsje, sum(JM_LJ_JZJJFSJE) as jmLjJzjjfsje, sum(JM_LJ_GJZHFSJE) as jmLjGjzhfsje, sum(JM_LJ_XJ) as jmLjXj, sum(JM_LJ_JSXJ) as jmLjJsxj, sum(JM_LJ_TCJJJSJE) as jmLjTcjjjsje, sum(JM_LJ_DBJJJSJE) as jmLjDbjjjsje, sum(JM_LJ_JZJJJSJE) as jmLjJzjjjsje, sum(JM_LJ_GJZHJSJE) as jmLjGjzhjsje, sum(JM_LJ_JJBFXJ) as jmLjJjbfxj, sum(JM_LJ_JJBFJE) as jmLjJjbfje, sum(JM_LJ_DBSBBFJE) as jmLjDbsbbfje, sum(JM_LJ_KHBZJ) as jmLjKhbzj, sum(JM_LJ_KK) as jmLjKk, sum(JM_DY_FSZFY) as jmDyFszfy, sum(JM_DY_TCJJFSJE) as jmDyTcjjfsje, sum(JM_DY_DBJJFSJE) as jmDyDbjjfsje, sum(JM_DY_JZJJFSJE) as jmDyJzjjfsje, sum(JM_DY_GJZHFSJE) as jmDyGjzhfsje, sum(JM_DY_XJ) as jmDyXj, sum(JM_DY_JSXJ) as jmDyJsxj, sum(JM_DY_TCJJJSJE) as jmDyTcjjjsje, sum(JM_DY_DBJJJSJE) as jmDyDbjjjsje, sum(JM_DY_JZJJJSJE) as jmDyJzjjjsje, sum(JM_DY_GJZHJSJE) as jmDyGjzhjsje, sum(JM_DY_JJBFXJ) as jmDyJjbfxj, sum(JM_DY_JJBFJE) as jmDyJjbfje, sum(JM_DY_DBSBBFJE) as jmDyDbsbbfje, sum(JM_DY_KHBZJ) as jmDyKhbzj, sum(JM_DY_KK) as jmDyKk from APPROP_NOTICE_DATA_DETAIL where YEAR = #{year} and MONTH = #{month} AND IS_DEL = '0' group by YEAR, MONTH
